definition: to be unable to continue/to come to a dead end (idiom)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
the morning dew will swiftly dissipate (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
to scrape around for money/hard pressed for cash/cf 羅雀掘鼠|罗雀掘鼠 to net birds and dig for rats (idiom)
butchering one another as fish and flesh (idiom); killing one another/internecine strife
to think nothing of doing sth (idiom)/to do sth without considering the risks/to leave out of consideration
knife, saw, ax and hatchet (idiom); facing torture and execution
to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance
precarious as morning dew (idiom); unlikely to last out the day
